content: Mary's father Jacob Marshill, in his will dated 6-26-1816 (proved May, 1818), leaves to

tag: html body text p i span
content: "heir of my daughter Mary Hinshaw 5 shillings if demanded".

tag: html body text p span
content: This will was witnessed and signed by "J. Hinshaw" (presumably Jesse).

tag: html body text p small sup span
html body text p span
content: A will of one William Ward, dated March 19 1799, proved Feb. 1800, was witnessed by Jacob Marshill and Jesse Hinshaw, Jr. Presumably William Ward was a friend or acquaintance of Jesse.
